0.text: Bug 23138  [Wizards] Bad example in Javadoc of BasicNewFolderResource.

1.text: The javadoc for org.eclipse.ui.wizards.newresource.BasicNewBolderResource offers the following example:    IWizard wizard = new BasicNewFolderResourceWizard();  wizard.init(workbench, selection);  WizardDialog dialog = new WizardDialog(shell, wizard);  dialog.open();   This code will produce an error as IWizard is without an init() method.

2.text: I believe the example should read:   INewWizard wizard = new BasicNewFolderResourceWizard();  wizard.init(workbench, selection);  WizardDialog dialog = new WizardDialog(shell, wizard);  dialog.open();   Eclipse rocks.
